p: SF-36 is scored based on the total score, a score for each subscale, and a score for each of the physical and mental parts, according to instructions. Several grading scales are used for answering different items of this questionnaire, such as the 5-point Likert scale from excellent (100) to the poor (0) or yes (100) and no (0). Higher scores signify a better health status and vice versa [ 31, 32].
